message: and it's much more topic based than irc typically is
i think that when people are creating topics, that return should create new-lines/paragraphs, not create the topic
then the message count could be turned into a reply count, which is a more interesting number
would help to see whether a discussion is going on or some is having a monolog
It'd be cool if the replies don't count the initial messages that the creator of the topic posted.
it makes @convore less irc-like, but I think that's good because it's not really intended to be just a web-based implementation of irc
they create the first sentence, then finish by replying to themselves
I have a different solution.... right now convore is topic based, but the way people create topics is sort of broken in that instead of writing the whole topic at one time
@djchall I think the reply count should be more how many people are replying in a topic and I disagree this is intended to be a simpler irc-like environment which I think is cooler
